title: EL Reading
description: Master reading through optimal learning states and proper positioning. A focused 4-lesson program with video and audio support for confident, empowered reading.

lessons.title: Introduction
lessons.description: A new perspective on learning to read

sections.content: Welcome to the EL Reading Programme

This programme introduces a revolutionary approach to learning reading. We focus on creating the optimal learning state and using proper positioning techniques to help you or your child develop confident, fluent reading skills.

items: How to create the optimal learning state for reading
The importance of proper positioning and emotional state
Practical techniques for confident reading development
How to apply these principles in daily practice

sections.content: Traditional reading instruction often focuses solely on phonics and decoding. While these skills are important, we believe that creating the right conditions for learning is equally crucial. By calming the nervous system and ensuring proper physical positioning, we create an environment where reading skills can develop naturally and confidently.

items: Reading difficulties often stem from stress and improper positioning rather than cognitive deficits
When the nervous system is calm, the brain can process visual information more effectively
Proper posture and positioning optimize visual tracking and comprehension

lessons.title: The Optimal Learning State
lessons.description: Calm your nervous system for effective reading

sections.content: The optimal learning state is a calm, focused condition where your nervous system is regulated and your mind is receptive to new information. When we're stressed or anxious, our ability to process visual information and decode text is significantly reduced. Creating this optimal state is the foundation of effective reading instruction.

items: Enhanced visual processing and tracking
Improved comprehension and retention
Reduced reading anxiety and frustration
More enjoyable learning experience

sections.content: To create the optimal learning state, we use simple breathing exercises and calming techniques. Deep, slow breathing activates the parasympathetic nervous system, which promotes relaxation and focus. Before each reading session, take a few moments to breathe deeply and settle into a calm, receptive state.

items: Take 3-5 deep breaths before starting to read
Breathe in through your nose for 4 counts, out through your mouth for 6 counts
Notice your body relaxing with each exhale
Begin reading only when you feel calm and focused

sections.content: This simple practice can transform the reading experience. When the nervous system is calm, the eyes can track text more smoothly, the brain can process information more efficiently, and comprehension improves naturally.

lessons.title: The Technique
lessons.description: Proper positioning and emotional state for reading

sections.content: Proper physical positioning is crucial for effective reading. The way you hold a book or position yourself in front of text directly impacts your ability to track words, process information, and maintain focus. Small adjustments to positioning can make a significant difference in reading comfort and comprehension.

items: Sit with your back supported and feet flat on the floor
Hold the book at a 45-degree angle, about 30-40cm from your eyes
Ensure good lighting that doesn't create glare on the page
Keep your neck and shoulders relaxed

sections.content: Reading is not just a physical and cognitive activityâ€”it's also an emotional one. When we approach reading with stress, fear of making mistakes, or pressure to perform, our ability to read fluently decreases. Creating a positive emotional association with reading is essential for long-term success.

items: Celebrate small victories and progress
Read books that genuinely interest you or your child
Never force reading when stress levels are high
Use encouraging language and avoid criticism
Make reading a pleasant, low-pressure activity

sections.content: Combining the optimal learning state with proper positioning and a positive emotional approach creates the ideal conditions for reading development. Practice these techniques consistently, and you'll notice improvements in fluency, comprehension, and confidence.

items: Start with 3-5 deep breaths to create the optimal state
Set up your reading position correctly
Choose engaging reading material
Read for short periods (10-15 minutes) with breaks
End each session on a positive note

lessons.title: Conclusion
lessons.description: Celebrating your reading journey and next steps

sections.content: You've now learned the fundamental principles of our reading approach: creating the optimal learning state, using proper positioning, and maintaining a positive emotional connection with reading. These tools will serve you well on your continued reading journey.

items: Learned techniques to create the optimal learning state
Understood the importance of proper physical positioning
Developed strategies for positive emotional associations with reading
Gained practical tools for daily reading practice

sections.content: The key to continued progress is consistent practice using these principles. Remember that reading development is a journey, not a destination. Some days will feel easier than others, and that's completely normal. Trust the process, maintain patience, and celebrate every step forward.

items: Practice daily using the optimal learning state technique
Continue to refine your reading position
Choose books that genuinely interest you
Track your progress and celebrate improvements
Be patient and kind to yourself throughout the process

sections.content: Reading is one of the most empowering skills you can develop. It opens doors to knowledge, imagination, and communication. By using the techniques you've learned in this programme, you're setting yourself up for a lifetime of confident, enjoyable reading. Trust in your ability to learn and grow, and remember that every reader started exactly where you are now.

items: The optimal learning state is the foundation of all learning
Proper positioning supports visual processing and comprehension
Positive emotions enhance learning and retention
Consistent practice with patience leads to mastery
You have everything you need to become a confident reader
